channel.title: SoulScape Open Source help
channel.description:
I recently downloaded the open source Client "SoulScape" to play around with it. Since I know alot about servers and everything I figured I'll try this out for ZezumaScape. When I upzipped it the first thing I did was compile it to have all the .class files ready. When it finally ran, I keep on getting the message "Connection Error - Retrying in ## seconds. I was wondering if anyone knew how to fix these because I am new at client editing.
Thanks
~RXVL~ Owner of ZezumaScape 1, 2, and 3.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 06, 2006, 02:57:18 PM[/size][hr]Ummm, hello? Lol I think I'll try a full client like eyrescape, anyways if anyone can hepl, please PM me. I'm offering the co-owner spot and coding team spot on my server for help making a complete client.

item.title: SoulScape Open Source help
item.dc:creator: @nathanmarck nathanmarck
item.description:
@nathanmarck wrote:

i have the same problem just download hauntedscape client it fully works and it is open source

Read full topic
